content.rendered:
The STEDI 90w Diffuse LED Flood Light is the perfect LED Flood Light in a light weight shell. Packed full of 10w CREE XM-L2 LEDs for high intensity light and a diffused lens which gives a wide angle of flood.

WORK LIGHT WIDE BEAM

FLOOD BEAM!

DETAILS

PROTECTED AGAINST;

  • Reverse polarity
  • Shock proof,waterproof and UV shielded
  • RFI/EMC interference | Won’t interfere with existing electronic systems.
  • Voltage and current surge

SPECIFICATIONS

POWER 90 Watts
LED 9 x 10w CREE XM-L2
CURRENT DRAW 6.6a @ 13.6v (each)
VOLTAGE 12 to 24v
LUMEN 8,100lm
INGRESS PROTECTION IP68
COLOUR TEMP 5500K
LIFESPAN 50,000hrs
LENS LEXAN Optical PC
WEIGHT 1.240kg
BEAM 45° Flood

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x 90W LED Flood Light
  • Stainless Steel Nuts & Bolts
  • Stainless Steel Bracketry
  • Wire Tails

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
